item.title: MIUI OS1.0.5.0.UMPTWXM Fastboot update for POCO X5 5G Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO X5 5G Taiwan

Codename: moonstone

Version: OS1.0.5.0.UMPTWXM | 14.0

Fix: Some games crashed
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
